section.name: Frequently Asked Questions

p.strong: Where can I find the Mailing List Archives for Pluto?

section.p:
The lists are archived at several places, including:
Developer List (Apache Mail Archives)
User List (Apache Mail Archives)
http://news.gmane.org/gmane.comp.jakarta.pluto.devel
http://news.gmane.org/gmane.comp.jakarta.pluto.user

p.strong: Is Pluto a fully functional portal implementation?

section.p: No, Pluto is a Portlet Container. Within a Portal, the Portlet Container is soley responsible for managing the lifecycle of deployed portlets. If you are looking for a Portal implementation, try checking out Jetspeed.

section.p: See the architectural overview for a more complete description
